Sweet Potato, Pomegranate & Feta Salad
2 Large Sweet Potatoes
1 Pomegranate
100g Feta
Honey Salad Dressing
Chopped Pistachios
  1. Peel and dice the sweet potatoes, roast with oil salt and pepper
  2. Serve with remaining stuff over the top
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
